quotes.quote: I am getting up for a man's work. Do I resent going out to do what I was born for, or was i created to wrap myself in blankets and keep warm. Look into nature, we are created for both feeling and action
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: I can not be harmed by and should not harm the ignorant of true good and evil
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Life for each of us is a mere moment, and this life of yours is nearly over, while you show yourself no honour but let your own welfare depend on other people's souls
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: No one loses any other life than the one he lives, and no one lives any other life than the one he loses
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: The longest and shortest lives are brought to the same state, the present moment is equal for all
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: No one can lose either the past or the future - how could anyone be deprived of what he does not possess? ... It is only the present moment of which either stands to be deprived: and if this is all he has, he cannot lose what he does not have
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: It is nature that enhances things and gives them attraction, only for one who has developed a genuine affinity for nature and her works will there be many such perceptions
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Do not waste the remaining part of your life in thoughts about other people when you are not thinking in reference to some aspect of the common good
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: You should take no action unwillingly, selfishly, uncritically or with conflicting motives
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Stand straight, don't be held straight. Keep a cheerful demeaneor and retain your independence of outside help and the peace that others can give
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Never regard as a benefit to yourself anything that will force you to at some point break your faith, leave your integrity behind, to hate, suspect, curse another, disasemble, or hide caution-bearing secrets
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Tolerance is part of justice, wrongdoings are not deliberate, do not resent human wickedness
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Things can not touch the mind: they are external and inert; anxieties can only come from your internal judgments
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: All things you see change almost as you look at them, the universe is change: life is judgement
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: The best revenge is not to be like your enemy
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: While you live, while you can, become good
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: People of the past didn't sing your praises, why be desperate to be remembered by those of the future
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Acustom yourself not to be disregarding of what someone else has to say as far as possible enter into the mind of the speaker
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: What does not benefit the hive does not benefit the bee either
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Mere things, brute facts should not provoke your rage: they have no mind to do so
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Live each day as if it were your last, without frenzy, apathy, or pretense
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Abandon any concern for reputation and be satisfed if you can live the rest of your life in the way nature intended
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Don't be suprised when people act in their nature
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: It is not the thing itself that troubles you, but your own judgement of it
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Do not draw conclusions from first impressions
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: He who fears death fears unconciousness or another sort of conciousness, neither does harm
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Work. Do not work as a miserable drudge or in any expectation for pity or admiration. One aim only: action or inaction as civic cause demands
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Today I escaped from all bothering circumstances or rather I threw them out. They were nothing external but inside me, just my own judgements
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: You should leave another's wrong where it lies
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: If any action of yours does not have direct or indirect relation to the social end, it pulls your life apart and destroys its unity.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Let no one have the chance to accuse you, with any truth of not being sincere or a good man. Make sure that anyone taking this view of you is a liar
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Greater grief comes from consequent anger and pain rather than the initial cause
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Kindness is invincible if it is sincere, what can the most aggressive man do to you if you continue to be kind to him?
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Your advice must not be ironic or critical, it should be affectionate with no hurt feelings, not a lecture or demonstration to impress others, but the way you would talk to someone by themselves, irrespective of company
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Anger is as much a sign of weakness as pain
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: There is nothing manly in being angry, but a gentle calm is more human and therefore more virile, It is the gentle that have strength, sinew and courage, not the indignant and complaining
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius
